attributes.action: Sqn Ldr Les Munro should keep his medals ...Government / lottery funding should pay for War  memorials
attributes.additional_details: Sqn Ldr Les Munro has decided to sell his medals to help towards the upkeep of a War Memorial..This is out of order .Sqn Ldr Munro earnt his medals and should be able to keep them for himself and family..The Government and or Lottery Funding should help pay for the up keep of the War memorial NOT Sqn Ldr Munro...
